title: How to score 95% in class 10 if I started studying from now - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: First of all 9th class is totally different from 10th class . Have a positive attitude and forget what was your level in 9th class. Maths: Remember formulae and know the concepts and do NCERT for practice. If you go to tuition then do the homework/classwork seriously. Do RD Sharma’s important question ask your teacher to mark the important question . Science: Class and tuition notes for theory purpose. You can also buy S Chand and can read from there but they have given unnecessary details also (very elaborative content present). So I Prefer you to Stick with NCERT. NCERT QUESTIONS more than enough for practice. English: NCERT + ALL in one (best combo). Practice NCERT and do previous year questions. See in book how to write the answers (in point to point manner). Social Science: NCERT More than enough . Read history as a story book. Hindi: NCERT+ Any refrence book to know the meaning of lines in poem. Do yoga and meditation and don’t take much stress it’s just an exam .You can do it :)

You can score even more than 95% And your’s ninth class marks doesnot matter 🛑 First of all, Try to complete your syllabus before february or even more earlier I have you are doing so😊 🛑Then do solve some previous year qiestion papers 🛑Try to learn the time management skills which will help you in your exams 🛑Make a timetable or set your goals and do work to achieve them and reward yourself For your achievements 🛑Never get demotivated… ALWAYS THINK IN YOUR MIND THAT YOU CAN DO IT!!!! AND definately you will do it👍👍 ALL THE BEST FROM SIDE!!!!🌈🦄

Hey buddy , Go only through syllabus ( nothing will be comes out of syllabus) 10 years solved questions papers definitely help you to score 90+ (I use Arihant publication that time and I am much satisfied with that) If you use side books like S.chand , R.S aggarwal , Pradeep etc. It's good but you have to read ncert throughly because 80% questions are come directly from ncert ( specially the exercise, the bold one ,and questions in the middle of the chapter) Self study is more important in all of these ( this is what more than half student does) All the best

Yesss you can it's very easy but be careful in last month of 10 boards preparation it is very important .attend the practice test of school analysis of paper very important .don't take tension it is very easy and work hard as much as you can………… ….
Jab 75% 9th mein aagaya toh 10th mein 95%aram se aa Jayega just complete your syallabus by solving chapter wise sample papers
